input.sentences: we entered the city and started exploring .
we walked up and down the streets .
we met awesome people along the way .
we stopped in time for a funeral service .
we payed our respects before moving on .
output.sentences: What a solemn day it was to hold a funeral.
Because someone super important died, we had the police everywhere, making sure the area wasn't bothered by crowds.
Friends of the deceased showed up to show their respects.
It was a very lovely ceremony, even though it made me sad.
Even powerful leaders showed up to pay their respects.
